Name: Does the Brain Detect 3G Mobile Phone Radiation Peaks? An Explorative In-Depth Analysis of an Experimental Study
Acknowledgements: Many thanks for the important technical support granted by Ron Hellenbrand, Ron Mengelers and Johan Gielissen.
HowToAcknowledge: A doi for this dataset has not been generated. For the time being please cite the journal article this data set supports: Roggeveen, Suzanne; van Os, Jim; Lousberg, Richel (2016): Does the Brain Detect 3G Mobile Phone Radiation Peaks? An Explorative In-Depth Analysis of an Experimental Study. PLOS ONE. Dataset. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0125390
EthicsApprovals: Approval was obtained from the medical ethics committee of the Academic Hospital Maastricht, on June, 6th, 2013.
